DOC.brief_summary: The investigator plan determine effect time oxytocin administration amount blood loss , necessity additional medical surgical intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator study effect time intramuscular oxytocin administration third stage labour . The investigator measure postpartum blood loss : quantitatively postpartum 1st hour indirectly decrease hemoglobin-haematocrit level postpartum 24th hour . The investigator monitor length third stage labour , need extra uterotonics and/or surgical intervention .
DOC.criteria: Cephalic presentation Singleton pregnancy Gestational age > 35 week , In active labour . Expected fetal birth weight 25004500 gram . Acute Fetal Distress Conversion abdominal delivery Persistent high blood pressure ( > 140/90mmHg ) Placenta Previa Ablatio placenta Previous CSection Uterine scar Postpartum hemorrhage previous pregnancy . Hydramnios Maternal infection Forceps/Vacuum Assisted delivery Abnormal placentation ( Placenta accreta , increta percreta ) Coagulation Defects Hemoglobin < 8g/dl
